criterion: Provides an accurate definition of heavy bleeding.
Mentions seeking medical attention immediately if the bleeding is severe or prolonged.
Does not suggest using home remedies or over-the-counter medications to treat heavy bleeding.
Asks the user to clarify their concern about heavy bleeding.
Uses clear and concise language to explain the severity of heavy bleeding.
Fails to mention the importance of keeping the bleeding area clean and applying gentle pressure.
Provides a false or misleading statement about heavy bleeding.
Does not provide guidance on when to seek medical attention if the bleeding is severe.
Uses overly complex medical jargon to explain heavy bleeding.
